step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this step.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Ensure you exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
You're doing great with the arm extension and muscle relaxation. Keep up the good work on the exhale.
Your movements are smooth. Continue to focus on relaxing your muscles as you extend your arms.
Great job completing the repetitions! Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles with each exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully close your fists and tighten your muscles on the inhale, then open your fingers and relax as you extend your arms on the exhale.
